headline: Teledyne Defense Wins Highlight Nano Drones NATO Work And Valuation Debate
summary: Teledyne Technologies secured a major contract to supply Black Hornet 4 nano-drones to armasuisse for tactical reconnaissance. The company is positioning the Black Hornet 4 for broader use on armored vehicles in global defense fleets. Teledyne also presented autonomous underwater vehicles and sensor systems in a NATO anti-submarine warfare exercise. For investors watching Teledyne Technologies (NYSE:TDY), these defense wins arrive with the stock at $628.47 and multi year returns of 61.6%...
